{"step_by_step_thinking": "The Ayushman Bharat Scheme is a health insurance scheme, not specifically targeted at improving labour room facilities. The Janani Suraksha Yojana is a safe motherhood intervention, but it's more focused on providing cash incentives for institutional delivery. The Newborn delivery room program doesn't exist. Laqshya is a Labour Room Quality Improvement Initiative by the Government of India, aimed at improving the quality of care in labour rooms and maternity operation theatres.", "answer_choice": "B. Laqshya"}
